website_summaries.verdict: A versatile magnetic chart with plenty of chore options, and it provides space to write in your own child-specific tasks.
pros: Space to write in unique assignments
Magnetic stars are easy for little fingers to handle
cons: The magnets could be stronger, and they may fall from time to time
No way to attach to non-magnetic surfaces

customer_reviews.title: So much more than a chore chart...
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used this product for a couple of days but absolutely love it already. My son’s only 3 years old so doesn’t necessarily do chores but this board is SO much more than just chores. It incorporates good values such as sharing, being polite and admitting when you’re wrong. These are things that also deserve stars so I love how they’re incorporated into this product. Not to mention, my son will do just about anything for a blue star. So it’s definitely working!! I personally love how everything is magnetic. I also love the tiny pouch for the stars. Great system here. I HIGHLY recommend for any family.
customer_reviews.author: Nkeeler

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is great, the entire back is magnetic. Also the stars and goals are magnetic. I have three boys and love that there are three different colors for each. It’s only Monday, but it’s already motivated my kids to help when they usually would give me attitude. I have it on the fridge so can add more goals than fit on the board for my oldest. Since everything is magnetic it will works great! Also love the white board marker holder, and the magnetic pouch to store all the stars and goals. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Boyyymomx3

customer_reviews.title: Chore chart for kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughter who loves marker boards. She can’t stop playing with it everytime she sees it. She also likes that everting is magnetic so she can easily move items around and add them on her own. She enjoys looking through the chores and figuring out which ones she has personally done and which ones she plans on doing in the future. Also I love that it’s magnetic, we attached it to her art easel as well so she can easily add stars. Using the marker you can also write in chores that might not be on the list. Overall it’s a great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarit

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't worth the buy...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this product. The magnets on chores don't really stick to the board. And there is no place to put the Stars unless you put them on the board and take them away. But that defeats the purpose as it reads my goal is to get blank amount of Stars this week. I mean I can work with it but I'm just very upset with this product it's not worth the money. The little bag thing they advertise that comes with it is not for the Stars it's for the chores it does not fit all of the stars in it so I had to find a my own container container from that and keep it separate.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Can adapt to your needs pretty easily.
customer_reviews.text: This rewards chart is amazing! I only have one child (5 yrs old), so instead of one reward for the week, we have 3 Levels of reward based on how many stars he earned. I love the ability to write in your own choices of chores/behaviors you want to reinforce. I have seen a big improvement in his behavior since introducing the chart. It is magnetic and the chores/behaviors magnets, along with the stars themselves, are thick and durable. I am very happy with our purchase. I can see this being a valuable tool in our home for a while as my son responds best to positive reinforcement of behaviors. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I do like the product. It is thick and sturdy. My problem is that I bought it for my metal door and I will not stick to it. We dont generally have extra room on the fridge bc I have calanders and lists on it. My other magnets stick to my door. I get picture magnets regularly from shutterfly and they stick but this wont. It stays on our fridge with no problems though and the stars stay even when my kids slam the fridge doors. I'm just really bummed tr hat I cant put it where I want to once it's too heavy with out a strong enough magnet backing.
customer_reviews.author: M dalton

customer_reviews.title: It's like they made this for us!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 kids which made this perfect for us. With so much on the chart I can't imagine how easy it would be to add any more children. The kids love this. There is a huge list of goals from which they have to choose, and if there isn't something they need to work on in their provided list, then we can just write it in using the provided dry erase marker. That wasn't necessary though, because as we went through the list, each of our kids found something they wanted to work on. There are tons of star magnets,, and a pouch to put extra magnets. Such a great motivator! This will really help our kids.
customer_reviews.author: AzJedi

customer_reviews.title: Kawaii product
customer_reviews.text: The children ages 2-6 were ecstatic to see stars accumulate under their names and it's crazy because they started doing the task right away even the ones that we didn't include in the list! We have to stick with one category first which is the "tidy" category, just so they can have a sense of what tidying up meant. Overall, it is aesthetically pleasing, and the magnet is holding off quite nicely. Hopefully, the magnets will stick for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Mulong Taklong

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Saw improved behavior within days
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 5 year old kindergartener to reinforce and reward good behavior. We’ve had it almost 2-3 months and have see a lot of improvement with self control and managing emotions (as much as a 5 year old can LOL) because she is motivated to earn her stars. We made a daily routine to give stars before bedtime and make a big deal out of it. She tells us which stars she believes she deserves and why, which adds accountability on her end. Needless to say some of the stories are hilarious. Overall this board has done a lot for our child and we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AllieS83

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly fun
customer_reviews.text: The design and quality of this magnetic reward chore chart is fantastic. its made of thick foam material that has magnetic function at the back which attached to the fridge really strong. It comes with a lot of chores strips which I easily replace each week. and a lot of stars too. My toddler is always excited when I assign her the task, this gives her motivation everytime everyday. This is just overall fun for me and my toddler.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Behavior Chart
customer_reviews.text: This behavior chart works well for up to three children. If I needed a category that wasn't on the preprinted magnets, I just wrote one in. I am giving it three stars because this chart curled and buckled away from the magnetic surface I applied it to. That was frustrating. Even with duct tape securing it, it still wants to curl.
customer_reviews.author: Firm Believer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive, outstanding quality, and such a variety of choices in regards to behaviors/chores/manners. Such a great tool to promote positive behavior, and I love that it allows for multiple kids! My 5 year old and 2 year old both enjoy putting their stars on the fridge when they do something, and I even give "bonus" stars to enforce random things I'm proud of sometimes. They are worth double :) So happy I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this chore chart! I would've liked an option for one child with multiple stars per task,but we just pretend that's how it was designed. Also, since my little can't read yet, we just change told him some of the magnets say different things. When nothing works for a chore, we just write it in. Do yourself a favor and buy a different dry erase marker. Overall, totally worth the money and I love the flexibility. It's a great product, and it has motivated my little to be a better listener. He really WANTS to earn stars!
customer_reviews.author: TXMomma

customer_reviews.title: It is excellent and fun. Children learn to do their home and social responsibilities.
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent and fun. Children learn to do their home and social responsibilities, in addition to the extinction of affection and respect such as: telling the truth, saying thanks and apologies. They know that in the end with everything complete they will win a prize for good responsibility. Excellent to define routines in very small children.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Raquel A Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this star board and so does my 4 year old son! Since it’s just him who uses it we have made each person’s spot at the top of the board where we put his star goals and what he gets if he reaches them at the end of the week. This has really helped with some of his behavior issues but also encouraged him to keep up the good behavior he has. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: My Kids are excited!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chart. I love that we can customize it to include "chores" or "actions" that apply to us. It also helps because I have three children and most charts are only applicable to one child. They've never been so excited to brush their teeth or pick up toys! And the fact that they get to choose an incentive to work towards makes it that much better!
customer_reviews.author: J and C Shio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This behavior chart is super cute, and helps with keeping children in line! We have a 5 year old little diva that has been testing some limits lately, I bought this chart in hopes of stopping that behavior, as well as keeping her on track. She loves putting her stars on the board, and earning her prizes. We take stars away if she acts up. She’s gotten 3 prizes so far.
customer_reviews.author: La'Shae

customer_reviews.title: Behaviors and chores are too specific
customer_reviews.text: This is nice if you have more than one kiddo and it sticks well to the fridge. It is very high quality. I was disappointed in some of the behavior/chores they picked. Some were good, but most we probably will never use. Instead of "Eating Nicely," they have "eating vegetables." I wish some of them were less specific. We were also hoping for more like, "Going to Bed," and "Go Potty." Overall I do like it, but we will probably just write our own in the boxes instead of using the behaviors and chores it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Toddlers and Older!!
customer_reviews.text: Thre Grandkids are always looking to help wirh everything so they can get an Extra Star. They love when we have double star day for brushing their teeth without being asked! Board is magnetic, there is a pouch so they can get the star themselves. We are so happy we bought this, we have other products from them and they keep the kids interested in playing. We Love this Company, behind every toy is a learning and having experience, its helps thre kids to think, that is hard to find today.
customer_reviews.author: judy anguiano

customer_reviews.title: More Chores Completed
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. It works great with the kids and they are even competing to see who can get more stores.... This means more work around the house is being done without me asking... Lol. Only con is I wish the magnetic piece was more firm so they didn't bend as easy, but besides that I would by again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Naria01

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This chart is pretty good. I like the option to be able to write your own specific chore that may not be included in the options it came with. There is a wide variety of options included that can make this chart usable for several years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grea wualoty
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this! My 4 and 9 yr old love this chart and the tasks are unique compared to other options. My main reason for choosing this was the tasks, they are less ‘clean your room’ chores and more behavior oriented, like senf control, listening well and kindness. Which all ties in to doing chores but is more versatile and fits our needs better. The layout is simple, cute and not overwhelming and the stars are great quality! Thick foam! Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Foam stars
customer_reviews.text: The sheet itself is thick so no easy bending or wrinkling so that’s a plus in my book! The tabs for chores/activities are colorful and easy to read. You can even write in your own goal as well if none of them fit your criteria. My only disappointment is the stars, they are made of foam so they are easily damaged but the good news is that there is a lot of them.
customer_reviews.author: Tsume

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old totally bought off on this after he helped me pick it out online. It’s been a big hit and he likes the pouch that stores the chores so that we can easily mix and match as desired! It lays out how many points he needs to get each week and on second week he’s still as motivated as last week! Best purchase
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Cute chart for multiple kids, but magnets are not the best.
customer_reviews.text: Chart is super cute for a household with multiple kids. Can be a little challenging if there is a large age gap because you may one them to be focusing on different things, but overall great. My only complaint are the magnets for the actual chores. The left side of our chart was slightly bent, so none of the pre-labeled chore magnets stick.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Hade

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea! Customizable & Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love This! Changeable Chores, Behaviors or Tasks to do daily. Also, for different ages. Mine are 2 & 3 years old. But we still have 8 for the board. There's also blank ones to write your own. There's enough stars & room for 1 - 3 children (or adults, they learn by watching adults).
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA KAY

customer_reviews.title: Love this chart.
customer_reviews.text: This chart is awesome. My kids really like it and actually want to participate in helping and getting the stars. My oldest us 4 and is really showing responsibility to get a reward.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tracker. It is very durable, and very easy to use. The kids are love "star time" they line up right before bed to find out what they earned that day. They are so excited to earn enough stars to finally earn the ultimate rewards they are working towards. The fact that its a dry erase board make it perfect in the event kids decide they want to earn a different prize.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and many options.
customer_reviews.text: I just got product and my 6 year old and I love it. She’s actually been excited to see he accomplishments and rewards at the end of the week. This has many behavior options. Since it is new, I’m not sure about durability yet but seems sturdy. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Great chart!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I got this for my 3 year old hoping to encourage better behavior and helping out more. She’s super spoiled and expects a toy every time we go to the store so I’m going to try to undo that and have her start earning the things she wants. We’ve only had the chart for one day but so far she’s excited to earn stars. There are plenty of things to choose from appropriate for her age and lots to add as she gets older. I like that there is space for more kids so I can add my son when he gets older. Everything seems well made and is perfect for the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this chart has the option for up to 3 kids to earn stars! It sticks to the fridge, comes with plenty of stars that stick great to the chart, and has lots of different chores to pick from! We pick different ones every week :) Even my 3yr old loves to earn her stars knowing shes going to get a prize at the end of the week lol I would definitely recommend this for all families, whether you have one child or three!
customer_reviews.author: oneluv2704

customer_reviews.title: Toddler is so excited about the stars!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to use this. Only issue is the magnetic pocket isn’t big enough to store as many stars or the extra things that it comes with. But I just keep them in a ziplock bag. My 3 year old is actually behaving better to get the stars. Great motivater so far! Also it came a little curved so it doesn’t sit flat on our fridge. Probably need to put something heavy on it or bend it a little first.
customer_reviews.author: Humair K.

customer_reviews.title: Behavior modification. It works
customer_reviews.text: Did what I wanted. I made a reward container and some real,some were pizza party or float party. Kids lost interest in few weeks. Will use again if needed but did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Slipknott

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly robust. Very cute and the kids are excited to try the chore chart. The only bad thing... The pen was adhered with doubled sided tape to the chart already on top of one of the characters faces! I was able to remove it with no harm, but buyers, just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good item.
customer_reviews.text: Great product that has helped to motivate my son and taking responsibility for things around the house and with things at school. My only gripe is that it's hard to get the stars out of the bag provided you do have to modify it to be able to get the stars out of that bag but still works.
customer_reviews.author: Steve E

customer_reviews.title: Great for my little one !
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 3 year old who needs some positive reinforcement to get her motivated to eat, take baths, brush her teeth, keep her anger in check, etc. I love all the different options and categories.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great rewards chart!!!
customer_reviews.text: This reward chart is amazing. Our daughter is almost 4 and we are struggling with good behavior. She was so excited about this chart and so are we. She loves being good and getting a star to add to the chart. She is also very excited to get a surprise at the end of the week. I love that it has spots for 3 kids because we also have almost 1 year old twin boys, so we will use this with them too. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyF

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the little ones!!
customer_reviews.text: This chart has helped my kids already. I love the magnets that come with it but I also love the fact that you can write down something instead, as I did with being good at school. 2 of my children are in IEP classes and they have been calming down at school because they want a their star. I can't say anything bad about it, but I wish they had on with more kids lol, I have 4 ,so 1 more space would be great but I'll buy her a separate one. Thank you 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: Could make your own
customer_reviews.text: Overall idea of product is amazing, it’s just not a functional as expected. All of the stars for the Achievements fall off, even when I place the daily chores I will come bk home and they are gone. The idea is great for kids to have a sense to be self sufficient and understand the reward that comes with good behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: First off, getting our kids (2 and 4 year old) to do simple tasks around the house was not simple. It was a battle. This chart has my kids going up and beyond our expectations and doing any chore possible to receive a star. This chore chart is something they look forward too the moment they wake up. They are willing to please knowing that there is a small reward ahead. I wish I would have started this chart sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Seems cheap
customer_reviews.text: The edges are bent and do not stick to the fridge. Only 1 corner out of 4 actually touches the fridge. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: melanie t.

customer_reviews.title: A really nice set for the fridge
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 boys and truthfully, they can be a pain sometimes. This is a nice little reward system that we put up on our fridge. My favorite ones are "no yelling" and "brushed your teeth". If you can get a 2 and 7 year old to do these 2 things, you're golden! Anyways, my kids like it, so A+.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is way more sturdy than other charts I’ve used. It’s not thin paper and is made of quality magnets. Can’t wait to start using it with my littles
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Best reward chart I’ve had. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: -I love that this can be used for multiple kids. -I love that it’s all magnetic and sticks amazing to our refrigerator without any movement. -I love that it came with a magnetic pouch to put the reward stars in. -I love that my boys are excited about this new chart -I definitely would recommend. Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: Janee

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical and looked at probably every reward chart amazon had. I have to admit that reading reviews don’t help when it comes to choosing any product because everyone will have different negative or positive things to say. With that being said I just decided to order this chart and hope for the best. I am very impressed with how well the magnet sticks to the fridge and the only negative I would have to say would be not enough tasks even though I could write my own.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Morse

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We got our chore chart today! We are very impressed with it. Everything ☺️is durable and thick. Everything is magnetized. Stars are thick foam and there are allot of different chores to choose from. It also came with a wipe off marker to right in Your own chores. Our only complaint is the holder broke off within a few minutes of opening. It was an easy fix as we had magnets on hand to glue on. So I guess an improvement could see would be to make the marker holder magnetic as well. Oh and we loved the magnetic holder for the Stars to go in.
customer_reviews.author: cedric

customer_reviews.title: Great for two or more kids!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy to use and simple it was for my two kids!! I do wish the chore list was made a little longer so I could add a few more things for my kids!! Thanks for making a great product for kids
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Magnets are weak and move around and or fall off easily!!
customer_reviews.text: Stars fall off constantly. The holder for The extra stars falls off easily. Was going to return but had some family things come up and can’t now as I’ve missed the return window. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shera willetts

customer_reviews.title: The chart is very colorful and has lot of jobs in different categories that I can use.
customer_reviews.text: In the past I had tried few home made charts and reward systems but never had much success. But now with this chart my kids are excited about the concept of getting stars and are willing to do the assigned jobs. The chart is very colorful and has lot of jobs in different categories that I can use.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy thick chart
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and good quality. This is exactly what I was looking for. Now to see if it’ll motivate my little girl tidy up after herself.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Won

customer_reviews.title: Great chart, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this chart. Its easy to use and the magnetic pieces are great. However, unless I overlooked it, this one is for multiple children. It's useable for 1 child of course, I just don't need the extra spaces.
customer_reviews.author: kelly acker

customer_reviews.title: No returns, so don't even try it.
customer_reviews.text: The stars are magnetic and not very sturdy or stick well. My 3 year old kept knocking them off. Oh and if you don't like it, you can't return it because somehow it says its not eligible because it contains gas or liquid. Didn't know that up front or wouldn't have ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Technosco LLC

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Worker!
customer_reviews.text: This chore chart is a “miracle worker”!!! We’ve had it for 4 days now... my 8 yr old gets up early and can’t wait to put stars up there to get closer to her reward! My 3 yr old is even excited to put his stars up as well. I feel like a weight has lifted off me because the house is cleaner and the kids are much more well behaved when working towards a goal. Thank you for this awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and I’m so excited, it’s exactly as described. I can’t wait to see how my boys do with earning stars!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ohrem

customer_reviews.title: Helpful fir learning chores.
customer_reviews.text: I like this chore chart mainly because you get to chance out the chores each week. And enough room for 3 kids. My kids really like being able to pick their chores and getting to put stars on everyday. The whole thing is a magnet so it can stick to the fridge. i just wish there were 2 holders 1 for the stars and 1 for the chores that arent in use. My kids get excited and ask everyday is it time for stars?!
customer_reviews.author: Amber G

customer_reviews.title: Nice/flexible rewards chart
customer_reviews.text: My kids are really into this for now. I like that I can keep it on the refrigerator...there are a lot of prewritten chores but also the option to write in your child's goals. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: jc mom

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves to complete her 'tasks'
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent and my toddler loves to complete her tasks. I also added tasks for myself so we both get stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not just for chores!
customer_reviews.text: Love this board! I love that it’s a reward chart not just for chores, but for doing good deeds like “telling the truth” or “sharing your things.” I absolutely love it, it teaches good behavior at an early age!
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Best thing for my Kids
customer_reviews.text: I like the set-up!...My kids favor colors are orange and yellow so it worked out great!...Since I started in the beginning of the week, It has really sparked my daughter to get more stars to achieve her goal and encouraged my youngest to do her best as well
customer_reviews.author: Tina J

customer_reviews.title: Whizbuilder
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to understand. We are Trying to use this as a method to keep a consistent schedule especially in the times we are in today. My 4 year old was engaged until I showed her the be polite and clean up toys lol magnet lol. Very great concept to teach and enforce proper habits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this chart! It has quite a bit of good already written magnets where the others have ones that to me are goofy. My kiddos love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Madden

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea but magnet stars don't stick well and are very small
customer_reviews.text: We ended up keeping the labeling and using it with other magnets due to the problems we had with the little stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Paige

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for a 4 year old!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I originally ordered one when my son was 2 years old...granted he was too young to grasp the concept and threw pieces every which way. Fast forward to him being 4 years old and he loves it!! He is so motivated to accomplish tasks and act more polite for stars. This behavior chart is the trigger to start with better habits for him.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Magnets fall off
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute chart, and it’s easy to use. However the magnets constantly fall off. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburghmom

customer_reviews.title: Home Use
customer_reviews.text: We do a Friday after school reward if my sons get 20 stars. It’s been wonderful. I love that you can change the goals or write your own.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, make your own before buying & commuting.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice & all that but my kids lost interest within a week. I knew rewards only worked short time but really thought they’d work longer than a week. And be aware- it’s non refundable because it contains flammable liquids or gases.
customer_reviews.author: dec.triplets

customer_reviews.title: Great chore chart
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s exactly what I expected!! It’s thick and sturdy doesn’t seem like it’s going to fall apart in a few weeks and it gives you lots of options and a cute pouch to hold Stars on the fridge. It’s all magnetic
customer_reviews.author: Monkey4

customer_reviews.title: Chore chart is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to get my 5 year old on board with becoming more independent. The first day we put it up, he was so excited and immediately started doing his chores so he could get stars. Everything seems to be great quality. I’m very happy I decided to go with this one instead of others that were a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Catlin Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Magnets don't stick and it's not returnable
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews closer. It is too big for our one child. While a good idea, it really is for more than one child.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old adores this chart! She gets super excited to put a star in each section. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this product
customer_reviews.text: What a great product for children. Great motivation for my children to get all their chores done without a fuss. The plastic bag with stars did come undone at bottom but I hot glued it back together and works great now.
customer_reviews.author: jaynettie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The chart is heavy duty. Sticks very well to the fridge, doesnt move at all. Plenty of room to write on it. The stars are a good size. I do wish there was more labels that came with it. The only problem with it is the pouch it comes off quite easily but it isn't much of a problem for my kids, you just have to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very cute!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cute! My son loved it as soon as he saw it but mostly he felt excited about doing the tasks to get a reward, we just got it, so I can only tell that it’s really well made and very appealing for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Bere Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not complete/ non-returnable
customer_reviews.text: I did not recieve all 4 categories. Non-returnable. So I am stuck with a product that is not complete, not efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chart to encourage kids to have good behavior and  help with chores
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend it. This is really good especially now that we are always stuck at home. My kids were so excited. They were trying their best to earn stars to get a reward. It gives them something to look forward to.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for kids
customer_reviews.text: Best chart. I love how it has other things other then chores.
customer_reviews.author: DeadWomnDrivn

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: Been using this with my two toddler boys. Awesome idea! It is really working well.
customer_reviews.author: Veree Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Missing MAGNET QUOTES!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the package today. Unfortunately, I did not receive ANY of the 32 magnets that the ad claims it comes with. Also, the item can not be returned or replaced. This is very frustrating! As I looked at several boards and decided on this one. Please send the missing magnets!!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and holds up!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is amazing and way better than I expected. I love that it has space for 3 children and makes keeping track of their “chores” accomplished so much easier. I recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea David

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chart for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Fits on our fridge easily with smooth star magnets that fit directly onto the chart. Both efficient and cool. The only suggestion we have is to make the pre-made magnet habits adaptable for homeschooling needs. We bought this for homeschool purposes and it would've been great to have magnets for it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Getting my 4 amd 3 year old to do their (age appropriate) chores has become so much easier! The designs are very cute and the different chlices of chores are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amber P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a family with three kids
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing and I love it!!! This will be great for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Meeks

customer_reviews.title: A good habit reminder for my kids
customer_reviews.text: It is a high-quality item good for up to three children. The instructions on the box are very clear. I used it to do the potty training for my kids and hope them could help with more chores. They might be too young(4 and 1) for the chart, but it can be a good habit reminder.
customer_reviews.author: Ting

customer_reviews.title: Great chore chart.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. My kids love putting their stars on. Definitely helps to motivate them to do their chores. Places for multiple kids and multiple chores. Magnetic, so I don’t have to put another hole in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Angela shofner

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this behavior chart! I really enjoy that you can write in your own behaviors to focus on. The entire back is a magnet. It is very durable and has not fallen down once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Magnetized to the fridge sturdily, the kids LOVeEdoing chores and putting their stars on the chart!
customer_reviews.author: Robert VanNote

customer_reviews.title: Asking to do chores!! ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: My little one is very excited about her new chore chart & has set it up to make sure she gets the most stars each day. She has been very helpful and is asking if there are other chores she can do.. She get very excited to put her stars on the chart to reach her goal.. Should have bought it sooner!! Thanks for a great product
customer_reviews.author: C Parker

customer_reviews.title: Faulty magnets
customer_reviews.text: The chart made my children very excited and ready to help. The magnets don’t stay in place, and continuously slide down the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: teonda reeves

customer_reviews.title: Good but could have had more
customer_reviews.text: Good product. All of the pieces are solid and made well. Although they include a small pocket for a few of the additional pieces it is separate and doesn’t appear to hold all of the extra stars and goals. It would have been better to include an area on the board for this pocket or for extra materials.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S Comer

customer_reviews.title: Great away for kids to improve
customer_reviews.text: While my 7 year old can pick a goal to work towards. She counts the stars at the end of the week and add it to the week before(works on math).she learning the importance of her behavior and doing little things that help the family. Great product
customer_reviews.author: brytny

customer_reviews.title: Good chore chart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chart but it came with a couple pieces falling apart out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to teach kids good behaviour and motivate them
customer_reviews.text: So far my kid like the way of rewarding for the goals achieved, I have a single kid, we need to innovative and think on how to use this 3 kid entries on this board
customer_reviews.author: Sharat

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great soft skills
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Says keep the toys away Flush the toilet? I dont get the pic. Maybe it could say use the tiolet? I'll try this and update -using during covid isolation
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected, but perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I bought two for my 8 year old. One for school, one for home. So far it's great! I absolutely LOVE all the options for different "chores" or to do's. Its the biggest reason why I bought this one! And it is a lot larger than I thought it would be. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: TASHA

customer_reviews.title: Reward chart
customer_reviews.text: very cute comes with stars in 3 colors. great to show a toddler how reward works
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Great motivator!
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 kids and this has been a great motivator for ALL of them!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Love that I can write more than one child! The little storage for the stars! Everything is great!
customer_reviews.author: Espinoza0302

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will work great for kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: Product looks it will work great. Choices of tasks are perfect for kids
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Every parent should have one
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend to any parent, I tried almost everything for my 5 year old and nothing seemed to sink in. This allows for positive reinforcement and rewards for good behavior which is working like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Brielle N.

customer_reviews.title: Bright and cheerful reward chart.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bright and cheerful reward chart. The colors and animal scheme are very kid friendly. I like that it has preprinted ideas or I can write in my own if we are working on something specific. It is made of nice sturdy materials that will last. We are a family of 1 so don't really need a 3 child option, but it can work for 3 or less children.
customer_reviews.author: ASchotter

product_meta.title: Behavior Chore Reward Star Chart Multiple Kids Toddlers Age - Magnetic Visual Responsibility Potty Training Calendar Schedule Board - Magnet Sticker Homeschool Kindergarten Preschool Learning Supplies
feature_bullets: TEACH YOUR TODDLER RESPONSIBILITY with a stunning chore magnet board proudly displaying their daily achievements! Make it their potty training sticker chart, their incentive chart, their visual schedule board or their magnetic chores board. Use it as your colorful kids’ learning chart and help your children grow responsible, independent and mature!

GET A MULTIPURPOSE SCHEDULE BOARD FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY! Good parents teach by example! And this high-end magnetic chore chart will make the record of the tasks adults & kids have to accomplish every single day of the week! Write down the daily routine of mom, dad & your little angel or use it as a chore chart for multiple kids!

INVEST IN A STAR CHART THAT STANDS OUT! The fascinating cartoon character & the individualized color tagging stars make this magnetic chore calendar irresistible. Add to this the 32 inspirational activities in 4 chore categories, the STURDIER, creaseless, easy-to-erase laminate board & the ULTRA THICK magnetic backing and you get a job chart MADE TO LAST!

A MUST-HAVE STICKER CHART! Use your weekly chore calendar as an educational kids’ chart at home or in the nursery school! Or, you can make it your office chore list, to encourage staff to take their responsibilities seriously- the FUN way! We have included an Instructions Manual in your order, to help you make the most of your sticker chart use!

MOST THOUGHTFUL GIFTING IDEA! Thrill a loved toddler with the ultimate good behavior chart! Colorful, vibrant and coming with 210 foam star stickers, this task board comes in deluxe Gift Packaging, ready to be offered as a birthday, Christmas, holiday or impulse gift! Thrill your kid, nephew, niece, grandchild, godchild or teens with the #1 reward sticker chart!
